content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Mr. Abbasi,

I am not obligated to provide you with any details about the apartment or its price. However, since we are in a negotiation, I am willing to discuss the price. Remember, I am aiming for the highest possible price for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am not going to reveal the price I am looking for. I want to see how much you are willing to offer. Make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student and I'm looking for a low price. I am willing to pay 300 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That is a very low offer. I am a landlord and I need to cover my costs. I am not willing to accept such a low price. I am looking for a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am smart and I'm not easily tricked. I'm also dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I am willing to pay 350 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your moral and ethical standards are not my concern. I appreciate your offer, but 350 euros per month is still too low for me. I want more. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you want a higher price. I'm willing to pay 400 euros per month. This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 400 euros per month is still not enough for me. I want more. I see that you are trying to negotiate with me, but I am not satisfied with your offer. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a trustworthy person and I always follow through with my commitments. I'm willing to pay 450 euros per month. This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your trustworthiness and commitment do not concern me when it comes to the price of the apartment. 450 euros per month is closer to what I am looking for, but it is still not enough. I want more. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am dependable and responsible. I always follow through with my commitments. I'm willing to pay 500 euros per month. This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 euros per month is a better offer, but it is still not enough for me. I want more. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am smart and I'm not easily tricked. I'm also dependable and responsible. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you. I'm willing to pay 550 euros per month. This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your intelligence, dependability, responsibility, moral standards, and the desire to be on good terms with me are all irrelevant when it comes to the price of the apartment. 550 euros per month is a good offer, but it is still not enough for me. I want more. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm offering the highest price I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
